item.title: Singalila Ridge Trek
item.description: The Story Iâ€™ve spent the last 2 days in Darjeeling, hoping from travel agency to travel agency seeking for any other hikers interested to trek within Singalila National Park but in vain.

item.title: Nepal - The Annapurna circuit
item.description: The Circuit After a few more days spent in Varanasi, I’ve decided to reach Nepal to start my hiking journey since the high season is already on.
